root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 4-c-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 4. Ensure equitable, inclusive and quality education and lifelong learning opportunities for all4.c By 2030, significantly increase the number of qualified teachers, including through international cooperation for teacher training in developing countries, especially least developed countries and small island states in development4.c.1.Proportion of teachers in: a) preschool; b) the primary cycle; c) lower secondary education; and d) the upper secondary cycle which followed (before taking up their duties or during the activity) at least the training courses organizedThis is the proportion of teachers who have received training before starting or during their tenure compared to all teachers according to the school level considered.Ratio between teachers who have undergone training before taking up or during their tenure and all teachers according to the grade level consideredNot available
